description.jp:
アフロヘアとひなチョコボが特徴の陽気
な飛空艇操縦士。
最愛の息子ドッジを救うため 神に等し
い存在「ファルシ」に挑むも 人々の敵
とされる存在「下界のルシ」にされて
しまう。運命を嘆きつつも 年長者とし
て時に仲間を諭しつつ奮闘した。
description.gl: A cheerful airship pilot best known for his afro and chocobo chick. He sets out with the intention of destroying the godlike beings、 the fal'Cie、 to save his beloved son、 Dajh、 but is branded a Pulse l'Cie and made an enemy of society. While at times heavyhearted、 he's always there to be the adult and talk some sense into his comrades.

jp.text: 逃げるぜ\nただし 前向きにな
父ちゃん 孤軍奮闘だあ……
俺から見りゃあ おまえもガキさ
死にゃあ許されるとでも\n思ってんのかあ！

gl.text: All right、 time to split. Not run. There's a difference.
Chocobo、 we just can't catch a break、 can we?
Problem with that is、 you're one of them.
You think you die and everything will be sugar and rainbows?
Got to keep you kids safe、 right?

desc.en:
12-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack
+ 4-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Guaranteed hit
Moderate boost to BRV damage dealt to single targets
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Grants [Chocobo Chick Fever] for 3 turns

Effects of [Chocobo Chick Fever]:
• Granted buffs duration +2
• Moderate boost to Max BRV, Attack
• Moderate boost to party's critical BRV damage
• Slight boost to party's stolen BRV overflow limit
desc.gl:
12-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack + 4-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Guaranteed hit
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 3 turns special effect Chocochick Fever

While special effect Chocochick Fever active:
 • Extends duration of buffs granted by self by 2
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK
 • Moderately increases party's BRV damage dealt with critical hits
 • Slightly increases amount party's stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV

12HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
＋4HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
必中

desc.en:
[Attack Boost] use +3

When using [Attack Boost]:
• Granted buffs duration +2, extended to party
• Slight boost to [Attack Up]
• Grants party BRV based on Attack
• Triggers a 3-HIT ranged BRV attack + HP attack after use
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Does not increase turn count
• Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

After using [Attack Boost]:
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+] for 10 turns
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Large boost to total BRV potency
　∟ Guaranteed hit
　∟ Inflicts [S Attack Down], [S Defense Down] for 6 turns

• Additional effects to [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] for 10 turns
　∟ BRV attack hit count increases by 1
　∟ Moderate boost to total BRV potency
　∟ Guaranteed hit
　∟ Inflicts [S Attack Down], [S Defense Down] for 6 turns
desc.gl:
Attack Boost use +3

When using Attack Boost:
 • Effects granted to party
 • Slight ATK Up boost
 • Granted buff duration +2
 • Grants party BRV based on own ATK
 • Triggers following actions on selected target after use: 3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

After using Attack Boost:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; large cumulative BRV damage boost; guaranteed hit; target: 6 turns ATK Down I, DEF Down I) for 10 turns

When using HP Attack, HP Attack+ for 10 turns after using Attack Boost:
 • BRV attack hit count to target increased by 1
 • Moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Guaranteed hit
 • Target: 6 turns ATK Down I, DEF Down I
